page.title: 14The Lawns.
page.content: My group has chosen to visit The Lawns. The Lawns is place where students of Hull University live while they are studying at the University. The first things that we saw were a bus stop and a huge car park. The Lawns is a long way from Hull University and so the bus service is very important to the students. We went to The Lawns Centre first, which is a huge building. In the building there was a bar, a dance floor, a T.V. and many other small rooms. No students live in the Centre and so we were shown to one of the Halls where the students live. We were lucky because one of our girl's mums works as a housekeeper in a Hall. She met us outside the Hall with a big bunch of keys.
